Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hey how can i change my email? i will no longer have access to this email. would like to change my email to takewhatsyoursroly@gmail.com

To change your email on NewsBreak, you'll need to sign in to your account and go to the 'Me' tab. From there, select 'Edit Profile' and update your email address. If you encounter any issues, feel free to reach out for further assistance!
there is no me tab , show me

It seems like you might be having trouble finding the 'Me' tab. In the NewsBreak app, look for a profile icon or a section labeled 'Profile' or 'Account.' Once there, you should find options to edit your profile and update your email address. If you're still having trouble, please let me know!
im not on the newsbreak app. im on news break ad manager.

Ah, got it! To change your email in NewsBreak Ad Manager, you'll need to contact support directly. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your current email and the new email you'd like to use. They'll assist you with updating your account information.
